description: This scholarship was established by Jeanette Nance and will be awarded to a Political Science student. Jeannette and daughters, Joy and Julie, are alumnae of the University of Central Oklahoma. Eligibility Requirements Must be a junior in political science enrolled full-time Preference for a working single parent or students with other extenuating life circumstances Minimum 3.00 GPA but preference for candidates with a GPA above 3.5 Demonstrates leadership as determined by faculty and/or a student who participates in student organization activities

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
